title: can't enable internal messages app
body:
i get an error message when i try to enable internal messages saying "error while trying to enable app" and i have already enabled user photo 
i am running windows 7, iis 7.5, php 5.3, mysql 5.7 and owncloud 5.0.11

this is the log

debug	core	 include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	 2013-10-16t01:54:08+00:00
debug	core	 user backend oc_user_imap already initialized.	 2013-10-16t01:54:08+00:00

error	core	 user backend oc_user_imap not found.	 2013-10-16t01:54:21+00:00
